page.title: 08PLAYING OURSELVES
page.content: For children{SUMMERTIME}is best when the swimming pool,putting,trampolines, boating pond and the facilities at Seton Sands Camp Site open for the short season till the end of August.All year round there is the{ {KING GEORGE V PARK}for football and games of all sorts.There are swings and other amusements for young children.Tennis and Bowling are also available here in the summer.There have been local demands for more playing space for children at the Cockenzie end of the area.In Winter there are Junior Sports Clubs,Guides,Brownies,Cubs,Boys'Brigad e,Junior Red Cross,Discos etc.Adults find entertainment in several local inns and through club sections of{THE {ROYAL BRITISH LEGION}and in organisations of the {CHURCHES.}
